name: Baked Sweet Potatoes
description: These make a great lunch or snack. They get sweeter over time in the refrigerator, so bake some up and cut thick slices to go with cottage cheese, goat cheese, or feta for a quick lunch.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425ºF. Scrub sweet potatoes and pierce in several places with a sharp knife. Line a baking sheet with foil and place the potatoes on top. Bake for 45 minutes to an hour, depending on the size of the potatoes, until thoroughly soft and beginning to ooze. Remove from the heat.

Place on a plate or in a dish and allow to cool. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate (they will continue to ooze and sweeten). Serve cold (cut in thick slices and remove the skin) or room temperature, or reheat for 20 to 30 minutes in a 350ºF oven.
